help-file.title: CLERIC
help-file.content:
Clerics are holy and powerful spell casters who obtain their magical power from the gods and goddesses they worship. Their primary goal is to spread the word of their faith and to bring good to the world. Most of the Cleric's spell arsenal is defensive and healing in nature, making them one of the most integral parts of a group.
Allowable races: Human, Drow Elf, Grey Elf, Mountain Dwarf, Halfling, Half-Elf, Gnome, Orc, Goblin, Duergar Dwarf Innate abilities: God Call Equipment usage: Like all classes on Duris, Clerics have their own specific item restrictions. They are restricted in their use of weapons, mainly using maces, clubs and staves. Some exceptions are allowed, however. They can wear almost any type of armor, but are mildly restricted in the use of miscellaneous magical items.
